text: AI-generated text is exactly as it sounds! It is text that is generated by an AI.

Text to Text generation:
When you write a sentence to the AI, the AI generates a sentence back.

For this type of generation, we will be using OpenAI's CHATGPT as an example.
Try to chat with it!

We will learn more about text generation in the
Large-Language Models and Generated Text module!
Please click on either Text, Image, Audio, or Video
